headline: Is Hartford Insurance Group (HIG) Attractively Priced After Recent Share Price Pullback
summary: If you are wondering whether Hartford Insurance Group at around US$131.93 is still a sensible entry or hold, the key question is how its current price compares with its underlying value. The stock has seen a 2.9% decline over the last 7 days and a 4.9% decline over the last 30 days, while the 1 year return is 20.6% and the 3 year and 5 year returns are 86.2% and 178.8% respectively. Recent attention on Hartford Insurance Group has focused on its share price performance over different time...
